sentences.en: a loft extension
sentences.cn: 增建的阁楼

sentences.en: After a further four-month extension of her probation period, she was sacked.
sentences.cn: 在又试用了4个月后，她被开除了。

sentences.en: Call the switchboard and ask for extension 410.
sentences.cn: 你先打电话到总机，然后要求转分机410。

sentences.en: Can I have extension 316, please?
sentences.cn: 能帮我接316号分机吗？

sentences.en: Do you know Mr Brown’s extension number?
sentences.cn: 你知道布朗先生的分机号码吗？

sentences.en: Donald’s been given an extension to finish his thesis.
sentences.cn: 唐纳德获准延期完成他的论文。

sentences.en: For further information, please contact 414 3925, extension 2253.
He first entered Britain on a six-month visa, and was given a further extension of six months.
sentences.cn: 他最初持6个月的签证进入英国，后来又获得6个月的续签。

sentences.en: Ian Lentern has been granted a three-year extension.
sentences.cn: 伊恩·伦特恩已经被批准延期3年。

sentences.en: Our extension is nearly finished.
sentences.cn: 我们的扩建部分已接近完工.

sentences.en: Our host ran a long extension cord out from the house and set up a screen and a projector.
sentences.cn: 我们的主人从房里牵出一根延长电线，架起屏幕和投影仪。

sentences.en: Some of the best extensions are made from sections of rod tube or drainpipe.
sentences.cn: 最好的延长管中有些是用杆管或排水管制成的。

sentences.en: That's the logical extension of my approach.
sentences.cn: 那是对我的方法的合乎逻辑的扩展。

sentences.en: the extension of the copyright laws to cover online materials
sentences.cn: 著作权法向网络内容的延伸

sentences.en: The family had become in effect an extension of the Thought Police.
sentences.cn: 家庭便成了思想警察的延伸.

sentences.en: The Princess of Wales laid the foundation stone for the extension to the Cathedral.
sentences.cn: 威尔士王妃为大教堂的扩建奠基。

sentences.en: The pub’s got an extension tonight (= it will stay open longer than usual ).
sentences.cn: 酒馆今晚延时关门。

sentences.en: The pupils disliked the extension of the term.
sentences.cn: 小学生们不愿延长学期.

sentences.en: the study shows how television and, by extension, the media, alter political relationships.
sentences.cn: 这项研究表明电视，乃至媒体是如何改变政治关系的。

sentences.en: The support for the fence is mounted on an extension to the table.
sentences.cn: 篱笆的支撑部分安装在桌子延长出的地方。

sentences.en: The toolshed was built as an extension of the house.
sentences.cn: 工具房被看作是这座房屋的附加部分.

sentences.en: We are thinking of having an extension built, as we now require an extra bedroom.
sentences.cn: 我们正在考虑扩建房屋，因为我们现在需要多一间卧室。

sentences.en: We really wanted to build a completely new hospital, but we didn't have the money, so this extension is a kind of halfway house.
sentences.cn: 我们非常想新建一所医院, 但是没钱, 扩建算是折中方案吧.

sentences.en: We used so many lights that we needed four extension cords.
sentences.cn: 我们用的灯很多，因此需要4个接线板。

words.tran_cn: 可延长的；可展开的；可扩张的
延伸的；扩大的；长期的；广大的
延伸；扩大；推广；伸出；给予；使竭尽全力；对…估价

phrases.tran_cn: 延期；延长时间；延长合约期
拉簧；牵簧，牵引簧；拉伸弹簧
大学附校；大学推广教育

trans.tran_cn: 延伸，增加的房间，扩建部分，延期，延长，展期，扩大，电话分机，进修部，扩展名
trans.tran_en: the process of making a road, building etc bigger or longer, or the part that is added
